TEXT: If your hand has no Attacks, perform an additional effect.
Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, perform an additional effect.
At the start of your turn, if your have 12 or more stacks of this, die. NL At the end of your turn, gain a stack of this. NL For each stack of this you have, reduce your damage dealt by 4%.
Whenever you use a [#a83277]Technique[], if the last card you played was also a [#a83277]Technique[], perform an additional effect.
Mastery X: Can be upgraded any number of times. NL NL Upon reaching X upgrades, obtain a new form.
- Strength NL - Dexterity NL - Artifact NL - Buffer NL - Thorns NL - Intangible NL - Metallicize

At the start and end of a turn, and whenever a card is played, creatures with #yBurning lose between #b2 to #b5 #yHealth randomly. NL NL Whenever #yHealth is lost this way, reduce stacks of #yBurning by #b1.
